DOC.brief_title: Multidrug Resistance After Trabeculectomy With Mitomycin C
DOC.detailed_description: Despite the adjuvant use of mitomycin C during trabeculectomy, short-term and long-term failures still occur. We investigate whether mitomycin C treatment during previous trabeculectomy induces P-glycoprotein expression. Expression of P-glycoprotein is analysed in surgically removed Tenon tissue using immunohistochemistry.
DOC.criteria: patients with planned trabeculectomy for elevated eye pressure one third of patients without previous trabeculectomy two thirds of patients with previous trabeculectomy (one third with and one third without the use of mitomycin C) patients not requiring surgery patients with planned surgery for elevated eye pressure other than trabeculectomy
